contentencoded:
Do you have something personal to say about personal finance?

Marketplace Money needs you! Tell us about the issues affecting your wallet and share your expertise with us on the topics that matter. When it comes to debt and investments, the impacts of health care reform, getting ready for retirment, and especially your money -- YOU are the experts.

Join the Public Insight Network (PIN)  now and become a trusted source for our stories. You can expect an email about once a month asking for your insights. We might also get in touch to see if you're interested in coming on the show. (Listen to the audio player above to hear fellow PIN experts play a round of personal finance trivia with our host, Sarah Gardener!)

To get started, just fill out the form below.
